lines.text: Sandy, if you were to stay mad at me for the rest of your life, I couldn't blame you.
I couldn't stay mad at you for that long.
No matter what?
No matter what.
How about fighting with your sister? Meg's mad at me.
She'll get over it, and if she doesn't, then I can marry you.
Tom Stewart killed me!
What's the matter with a jazz magician?
If you loved someone and they did something bad, something real bad, would you keep it a secret?
Well friends usually try to help one another.
What if it's something real real bad?
Real real bad? Like what?
Like murder.
Sandy, why did you have to see it?
I couldn't help it.
No, nobody could help any of it, except me. If I'd held my hand out to Vi I could've saved her, but I killed her.
There's a light on at the light house!
Sandy may have gone there, she's always talking about that place.
She wouldn't have gone in the dark.
We'd better make sure!
It's bad enough to accept a musician into this family, but a jazz musician is asking too damn much.
